Hello,

I have about 80 of T206 Taylor but I haven't felt that I have enough of them yet. Let me know if you have any for sale even error, miscut or anything.

Thanks!

I have the below two Taylors for sale.  10% off the price listed + free shipping.  Also interested in trading for higher end Polar Bears (PSA 4+).  Let me know, thanks!
